channel.title: How do i add commands tabs?
channel.description: I was wondering how i add commands like ::home and stuff to the emote tabs?? Can someone pleasse tell me??

item.source: How do i add commands tabs?

item.title: How do i add commands tabs?
item.dc:creator: @BurnInSilence BurnInSilence
item.description:
@BurnInSilence wrote:

This will invovle ‘cases’ and ‘sendQuests’
search

, 180);

This is the end of your sendQuest where “@yel@Yes” is normally found
Replace the text in the sendQuest, for example

sendQuest("@yel@Yes", 180);

should look like this

sendQuest("@blu@Home", 180);

Now for cases…
When you put your mouse over an emote tab it will show you the case ID at the top left corner, but ill use “Yes” ID so you can find them all
search

case 168:

and replace it with

case 168: //Home Tele Button if(!teleblock){ teleportToX = ####; teleportToY = ####; }else if(teleblock){ sendMessage("Your teleblocked fool."); } break;
post for more help

Read full topic
item.source: How do i add commands tabs?

item.title: How do i add commands tabs?
item.dc:creator: @delta delta
item.description:
@delta wrote:

case CASEOFEMOTE:
teleportToX = x;
teleportToY = y;
break;

Read full topic
